body.p: The Board also specified that measurement techniques an entity uses to develop accounting estimates include estimation techniques and valuation techniques. Specifying this avoids ambiguity about whether the effect of a change in an estimation technique or a valuation technique is a change in accounting estimate. The terms ‘estimation techniques’ and ‘valuation techniques’ appear in IFRS Standards—for example, IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures uses the term ‘estimation techniques’ and IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement uses the term ‘valuation techniques’.
